text:
Hello,
Can someone guide me to how I can *create a draft email* via the *api* …

The <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/marketing/marketing-email|website> gives this to use as an endpoint url = “<https://api.hubapi.com/marketing/v3/emails//draft>” as says _“If no draft exists, the system creates a draft from the current “live” email then applies the request body to that draft. The draft version only lives on the buffer—the email is not cloned.”_
What do /i use as the emailId if I create it from new ? -------> PATCH*`/marketing/v3/emails/{emailId}/draft`*

When I tried the above I get the following returned:

``` {'category': 'OBJECT_NOT_FOUND', 'context': {'id': ['draft']}, 'correlationId': '54e7504e-dcbd-4d35-9d2e-2cd64c354215', 'message': 'Object not found.  email are usually numeric.', 'status': 'error'}```

Also, I want to transfer about 1000 emails from another HubSpot account so will look to do this on a loop. Downloading the emails from the other HubSpot account is not the problem, but adding a draft to the new account is the problem …..

Hi All,

How to fetch a deal ID that is associated with another Deal in HubSpot API? Is there any API Endpoints for this?

Hello there,
Can I make a PUTCH request to update properties in HubSpot by email, or is it required to use the contactId ?
contactId is required. So you first have to use the Search endpoint to search for the contact by email. That returns the Id which you can then use for the update
Okay very clear, thank you very much

Hello everyone,

I have a question. I am currently using the CRM Product API from my own software to synchronise my inventory with my HubSpot account. (/crm/v3/objects/products)

I have folders in my products. I would like to create/update/archive the products directly in a specific folder via API. What do I have to adjust here in the request, I haven't found anything in the documentation.

Thanks in advance!
There are folders* for my products in HubSpot
<@U06GFNEJRJN> from what I can remember, the folders aren’t in the API just yet.

Hello, everyone. I have some legacy code in my hands. There are calls to the HubSpot API: /meetings-public/v1/book. I can't seem to find any documentation on this endpoint, yet it still works. Does anyone have an idea where I could find more information about this?
Ok thanks, is it planned to be integrated in the near future?

Hello,
I'm trying to search for a specific record in a custom object. I've been reading the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/api/crm/search|API Search documentation> but I can't quite figure out how to use it in Zapier.

For my Custom Object (2-21988853), I want to search for its records and filter to only retrieve record(s) that contain a specific Student ID property (191689449). But I don't know how to format it in Zapier. When I try to format it as shown in the picture, I get this error.

Thank you for always helping me! Greatly appreciate it :slightly_smiling_face:

I'm using the `<https://api.hubapi.com/cms/v3/pages/site-pages>` endpoint to collect all published site pages for a client, in order to manip the data and return it to an external search tool. The intention is to collect _all_ pages, including dynamically generated HubDB rows. I don't want to collect the rows from HubDB because of the difference in the data structure.

I'm presently not getting back any of the dynamic pages from this query. It may not be the right way to acquire HubDB rows in their page form. I did see the `dynamicPageHubDbTableId` filter value, so my presupposition was that it would provide those rows as pages. I do see the dynamic page in the results array, but none of the other rows have their own pages, though they exist in the project.
